title: Footer
description: Site-wide footer organism with multi-column navigation, newsletter signup, social links, legal compliance, and trust signals. Marketing-optimized for email list building, trust signals, and conversion optimization.

metadata.description: Comprehensive site footer with navigation columns, newsletter email capture, social media links, legal links, trust badges, and copyright information. Essential for brochureware sites requiring credibility, legal compliance, and owned audience building.

accessibility.focusManagement: All interactive elements (links, form inputs) are keyboard accessible with visible focus states
accessibility.semanticStructure: Uses semantic <footer> element, <nav> for navigation sections, proper heading hierarchy with <h3> column titles

responsive.mobileOptimizations: 1-column layout on mobile, 2-column on tablet, 4-column on desktop. Social links and legal links wrap appropriately.

usageExamples.description: Agency/studio footer with portfolio links, services, contact info, and social proof.

usageExamples.title: E-commerce Footer
usageExamples.description: E-commerce footer with product categories, customer service, trust badges, and payment icons.

usageExamples.title: Minimal Footer
usageExamples.description: Clean, minimal footer with just essentials - 2 columns and legal links.

usageExamples.title: Newsletter-Focused Footer
usageExamples.description: Footer emphasizing newsletter signup for email list building. Critical for owned audience development.

usageExamples.title: Social-First Footer
usageExamples.description: Footer emphasizing social media presence and community building.

metadata.typicalUseCase: Site-wide footer for brochureware marketing sites. Provides navigation, legal compliance, email capture, and trust signals.

marketingContext.emailCapture: Newsletter signup is critical for building owned audience (not reliant on social algorithms). 60%+ of SaaS sites have email capture in footer.
marketingContext.trustSignals: Trust badges (SSL, payment icons, certifications) increase conversion by 42% for unknown brands (Nielsen Norman Group).
marketingContext.socialProof: Social media links with follower counts provide instant credibility. 80%+ of B2B buyers check social presence before purchase.
marketingContext.legalCompliance: Privacy policy, terms, cookie policy are required for GDPR/CCPA compliance. 70% of B2B buyers check legal pages before contacting sales.
realWorldExamples: Stripe: 5-column footer with product categories, resources, company info, newsletter, and trust badges
Notion: 4-column footer with product, download, resources, company, plus social links and legal
Shopify: 6-column footer with online store, POS, marketing, plus newsletter and social proof
Linear: Minimal 3-column footer with product, company, resources, emphasizing clean design
Vercel: 4-column footer with product, resources, company, legal, plus newsletter signup

conversionOptimization.newsletterPlacement: Footer newsletter captures visitors who scrolled entire page (high intent).
conversionOptimization.trustBadges: Security badges reduce pre-purchase anxiety by 45% (Baymard Institute).
conversionOptimization.legalLinks: Visible legal links reduce bounce rate by 20% for privacy-concerned visitors (CXL Institute).
conversionOptimization.socialProof: Customer count or follower count in footer increases trust by 30%+ (Unbounce).

variant.description: Visual style variant. 'dark' for dark background (high contrast), 'minimal' for simplified layout, 'centered' for center-aligned layout.

withDivider.description: Add horizontal divider line above bottom section (copyright/legal).

brand.description: Brand section with logo, tagline, and identity

tagline.description: Brand tagline or description (max 60 characters recommended)

external.description: Opens in new tab if true

newsletter.description: Newsletter signup configuration (critical for email list building)

inputId.description: Unique ID for email input (required for accessibility)

trustText.description: Trust message below form (e.g., 'No spam. Unsubscribe anytime.')

legal.description: Legal links array (privacy, terms, cookies - GDPR/CCPA compliance)

copyright.description: Copyright text (supports HTML). Use {{ "now" | date("Y") }} for dynamic year.
